Portal lg.$description: Gutters for Grid Layout when using Vertical Nav/Portal sites

Portal xl.$description: Gutters for Grid Layout when using Vertical Nav/Portal sites

xs.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class

sm.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class

md.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class

lg.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class

xl.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class

Portal lg.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout for portal sites. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class. Is a calculation in code:  48  calc(48px + (100vw - 992px) * (128 - 48) / (1312 - 992));

Portal xl.$description: Outer margins for Grid Layout for portal sites. Defined through inner padding on the .container-fluid class. Is a calculation in code: 128  calc(72px + (100vw - 1312px) *(128 - 72) / (1600 - 1312));

max-width.$description: Maximum width for grid within viewport. Includes outer margin.
